<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.WOT_Radius_Checker</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description>Returns answer as true if agent lies within the required radius else return false</description>
        <name>WOT_Radius_Checker</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var WOT_Radius_Checker = Class.create();
WOT_Radius_Checker.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    isWithinRadius: function() {
        var agentId = this.getParameter('sysparm_agentid');
        var sys_id = this.getParameter('sysparm_sys_id');

        var agentStatus = FSMUtil.calculateDistance(sys_id, agentId);


        if (agentStatus.isWithinRadius)
            this.agentWithinRadius();

        else
            this.agentNotWithinRadius(agentStatus.agentName, agentStatus.WOTNumber, agentStatus.differenceInDistance, agentStatus.agentUnit, agentStatus.agentRadius);

    },

    isCrewWithinRadius: function() {
        var crewId = this.getParameter('sysparm_crewid');
        var sys_id = this.getParameter('sysparm_sys_id');

        var crewStatus = FSMUtil.calculateCrewDistance(sys_id, crewId);


        if (crewStatus.isWithinRadius)
            this.crewWithinRadius();

        else
            this.crewNotWithinRadius(crewStatus.crewName, crewStatus.WOTNumber, crewStatus.differenceInDistance, crewStatus.crewUnit, agentStatus.crewRadius);

    },

    agentWithinRadius: function() {
        this.getRootElement().setAttribute('isWithinRadius', true);
        return;
    },

    agentNotWithinRadius: function(agentName, WOTNumber, differenceInDistance, agentUnit, agentRadius) {

        this.getRootElement().setAttribute('agentName', agentName);
        this.getRootElement().setAttribute('WOTNumber', WOTNumber);
        this.getRootElement().setAttribute('differenceInDistance', differenceInDistance);
        this.getRootElement().setAttribute('agentUnit', agentUnit);
        this.getRootElement().setAttribute('agentRadius', agentRadius);
        this.getRootElement().setAttribute('isWithinRadius', false);
        return;
    },

    crewWithinRadius: function() {
        this.getRootElement().setAttribute('isWithinRadius', true);
        return;
    },

    crewNotWithinRadius: function(crewName, WOTNumber, differenceInDistance, crewUnit, crewRadius) {

        this.getRootElement().setAttribute('crewName', crewName);
        this.getRootElement().setAttribute('WOTNumber', WOTNumber);
        this.getRootElement().setAttribute('differenceInDistance', differenceInDistance);
        this.getRootElement().setAttribute('crewUnit', crewUnit);
        this.getRootElement().setAttribute('crewRadius', crewRadius);
        this.getRootElement().setAttribute('isWithinRadius', false);
        return;
    },

    type: 'WOT_Radius_Checker'
});]]></script>
